entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
